name: Aaron Gustafson
bio: As would be expected from a former manager of the [Web Standards Project](http://webstandards.org/), Aaron Gustafson is passionate about web standards and accessibility. Heâ€™s been working on the Web for over two decades now and is a web standards advocate at Microsoft. In addition to working closely with the Edge team, Aaron works with partners on Progressive Web Apps, with a focus on cross-platform compatibility. He penned the seminal book on progressive enhancement, [<cite>Adaptive Web Design</cite>](https://adaptivewebdesign.info), and has been known to have some opinions, many of which you can read at [aaron-gustafson.com](https://www.aaron-gustafson.com/).
